group_1.narration: <Back to the day of the contest...>

group_1.textRight: [chara:121003:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Giggle* We swam a lot!

group_1.textLeft: Well, you were just floating around.@I'M the one who did all the swimming.
The contest hasn't even happened yet@and I'm already wiped...

group_1.textRight: But we've only just gotten started!

group_1.textLeft: I can't begin to count the number of@times I lugged you around...

group_1.textRight: You always indulge in me no matter what,@Momoko. I love how kind you are.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah..
...So what're we doing in this contest@anyway?
I don't really know much about it.

group_1.textRight: That's right, I never did explain.
In the Beachside Perfect Pair Contest,
participants are asked to present an@anecdote related to the beach.
The audience votes to decide the winner.

group_1.textLeft: An anecdote...? That's it?

group_1.textRight: Well, I imagine the pair's appearance is@also a factor,
as well as their chemistry when they@present the story.
Essentially, we need to make sure@we're both in sync.

group_1.textLeft: As in...a perfect pair?

group_1.textRight: Exactly!
That's why I prepared new swimsuits@for us.

group_1.textLeft: ...I get it. We've got matching accessories@this way.

group_1.textRight: Exactly. The impact of our appearance is@an important factor!
But the most crucial element of all@is the story itself.

group_1.textLeft: Is that why we were goofin' around all mornin',@so we'd have a memory to share?

group_1.textRight: Not at all.@I just did that because I wanted to have fun.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* But I do have a story in mind.

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh? What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: I was thinking of the incident where I was taken@by a wave and washed up on a deserted island.
Can you think of any other story as@interesting as that?

group_1.textLeft: ...Nope.
I'm just glad you somehow came back alive@and well...
When everyone heard you guys got swept@away, we were all in an uproar.

group_1.textRight: But we contacted you right away.

group_1.textLeft: Even so, there was no calming down until@you guys came back safely.

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry for worrying you...

group_1.textLeft: But would that memory really be okay?
It's a contest for two people.@I've got nothin' to do with that anecdote.

group_1.textRight: Yes, it'll be fine.
You just described how you were waiting for@me here, beside yourself with worry, didn't you?
If you talk about it on stage like you did@just now, we'll be fine!

group_1.textLeft: ...I think you might be a little too confident@about this.

group_1.textRight: No, we'll be fine~!
Well, we still have time before the contest.
Let's keep playingâ™ª

group_1.textLeft: Alright. Anything you wanna do next?

group_1.textRight: Oh, you're open to anything?

group_1.textLeft: Not ANYTHING!

group_1.textRight: Aww, too bad.
...Then I'll pull you around on the float,@just as I promised.

group_1.textCenter: ...You're in a really good mood, huh.
(Going on a secret shopping trip without@telling anyone...)

group_1.textRight: Momokoooo! Come on, let's go!

group_1.textCenter: (You know...I feel like she and I have@gotten close...)
(Still, if Rena, Kaede, or Mikage see us,)
(they're gonna be pretty upset at us for@not bringin' 'em along...)
